description: Build the ultimate pumpkin buddha bowl loaded with veggies, cajun-spiced chickpeas, fluffy rice and a dollop of yoghurt. Make this healthier dinner tonight.
name: Healthier Pumpkin Buddha Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 210g canned no-added-salt chickpeas, rinsed, drained (see Tip)
150g Kent pumpkin, peeled, cut into 3cm pieces (see Tip)
0.5 small red onion, cut into thin wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Toss chickpeas and seasoning together on 1 side of tray until well coated. Arrange pumpkin and zucchini on other side of tray. Spray with oil, then bake for 20 minutes or until pumpkin is light golden and tender.
Meanwhile, heat rice according to packet instructions.
Arrange rice, onion, spinach, chickpeas and vegetables in a bowl. Serve topped with yoghurt and seasoned with pepper.
